nodes.text: he hasn't been able to prove that harm and God are logically incompatible
if God is going to create a world of significantly free moral agents He has to allow them to make choices for evil
it may not be within God's power to create a world of free creatures in which evil does not exist.
Harm and God are incompatible only if it is impossible for them to exist at the same time
Given human freedom God cannot guarantee how people are going to use that freedom
if He intervenes every time to prevent people from choosing evil then we turn into puppets or marionettes.
